projects.title: Deriving Maxwell's Equations
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Deriving all 4 equations using Multivariable theorems.

Semester 1 final project

projects.title: Matrix Decomposition Proofs
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Proofs for LU, QR, Spectral, and Polar decomposition.

Semester 2 final project

projects.title: Matrix Chain Multiplication
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Presentation on how to optimize the order of matrix operations, with a computer simulation.

Final project for Linear Algebra.

projects.title: UP055 Thermo Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes for the Thermo portion of Light & Heat [UP055] at OHS.

Covers the basics of entropy and heat engines.

projects.title: UP055 Optics Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes for the Optics portion of Light & Heat [UP055] at OHS.

Covers Maxwell's equations to basic interference & diffraction.

projects.title: UP070 Relativity Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes for the Relativity portion of Modern Physics [UP070] at OHS.

Covers basic kinematical effects of special relativty to relativistic dynamics.

projects.title: F=ma Question Randomizer
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Imagine missing the cutoff by a point

Couldn't be me

Quick tool I made for practice

projects.title: UP070 Quantum Mech Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes for the Quantum Mechanics portion of Modern Physics [UP070] at OHS.

Covers the core mathematical formalism to a bit of the Schrodinger Equation.

projects.title: Standing Wave Boundaries
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Forms of standing Wave solutions and their use in acoustophoresis.

Final project for Differential Equations

projects.title: AP Physics C: E & M Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description: Notes for basic electricity & magnetism covered in the AP exam.

projects.title: Particle Physics Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes on David J. Griffiths' "Introduction to Elementary Particles," read over summer.

Had a hard time keeping up. At least I learned some new words, if nothing else.

projects.title: Quantum Computation Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes on Nielsen & Chuang's "Quantum Computation and Quantum Information," read over summer.

Largely a skim.

projects.title: UP135 Quantum Comp. Notes
projects.author: Gene Yang
projects.description:
Notes for the Introduction to Quantum Computing [UP135] at OHS.

I've moved to LaTeX-based notes, which are easier to make and edit.

Greek is hard.
